database_info.title: GDPR Legal Background Database for RAG-Enhanced Annotation
database_info.description: A structured, label-specific database of legal background material for GDPR transparency annotation pipeline
database_info.coverage: Complete coverage of GDPR Articles 13 and 14 transparency requirements

requirements_overview.label: Controller Name
requirements_overview.description: Identity and contact details of the controller and, where applicable, the controller's representative

requirements_overview.label: Controller Contact
requirements_overview.description: Contact details enabling data subjects to reach the controller for privacy-related inquiries

requirements_overview.label: DPO Contact
requirements_overview.description: Contact details of the data protection officer, where applicable

requirements_overview.label: Data Categories
requirements_overview.description: Categories of personal data concerned (when not collected from data subject)

requirements_overview.label: Processing Purpose
requirements_overview.description: Purposes of the processing for which the personal data are intended

requirements_overview.label: Legal Basis for Processing
requirements_overview.description: Legal basis for the processing of personal data

requirements_overview.label: Legitimate Interests for Processing
requirements_overview.description: Legitimate interests pursued by the controller or third party (when applicable)

requirements_overview.label: Source of Data
requirements_overview.description: Source of personal data and whether it came from publicly accessible sources

requirements_overview.label: Data Retention Period
requirements_overview.description: Period for which personal data will be stored or criteria to determine that period

requirements_overview.label: Data Recipients
requirements_overview.description: Recipients or categories of recipients of the personal data

requirements_overview.label: Third-country Transfers
requirements_overview.description: Information about transfers to third countries and safeguards in place

requirements_overview.label: Mandatory Data Disclosure
requirements_overview.description: Whether provision of personal data is mandatory and consequences of failure to provide

requirements_overview.label: Automated Decision-Making
requirements_overview.description: Existence of automated decision-making and information about logic and consequences

requirements_overview.label: Right to Access
requirements_overview.description: Right to request access to personal data and related information

requirements_overview.label: Right to Rectification
requirements_overview.description: Right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data

requirements_overview.label: Right to Erasure
requirements_overview.description: Right to request deletion of personal data (right to be forgotten)

requirements_overview.label: Right to Restrict
requirements_overview.description: Right to request restriction of processing of personal data

requirements_overview.label: Right to Object
requirements_overview.description: Right to object to processing of personal data

requirements_overview.label: Right to Portability
requirements_overview.description: Right to receive personal data in portable format and transmit to another controller

requirements_overview.label: Right to Withdraw Consent
requirements_overview.description: Right to withdraw consent at any time (when processing is based on consent)

requirements_overview.label: Right to Lodge Complaint
requirements_overview.description: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

examples.explanation: Why this is a correct annotation

usage_guidelines.rag_integration: This database is designed for integration with retrieval-augmented generation systems for GDPR transparency annotation
usage_guidelines.search_functionality: Entries can be searched by label name, GDPR references, or content
usage_guidelines.version_control: Each entry includes version and last_updated fields for tracking changes
usage_guidelines.source_verification: All legal text and commentary includes source references for verification

legal_sources.guidelines: EDPB Guidelines on various GDPR topics
legal_sources.recitals: GDPR Recitals providing context and interpretation
